structure_guidelines: Focus on evoking emotion and storytelling.
Highlight the feeling of relief and transformation the product provides.
Keep the paragraph concise (2–4 lines) to avoid overwhelming the reader.
Ensure the hero banner ties seamlessly into the narrative paragraph for a cohesive flow.
blueprint.persona_voice_guidelines: Empathetic, supportive, and family-focused. Speak in a tone that reassures and uplifts, emphasizing care and protection.
blueprint.offer_details: 25% off everything for a limited time

Goodbye tangles, hello savings! Treat yourself today.
preview_text_ideas: Transform your hair routine with 25% off everything.
Hurry—last chance to save on pain-free brushing!
key_points_for_descriptive_block: Highlight the frustration of painful hair brushing and the relief PopBrush provides.
Focus on the ease and comfort the product brings to daily routines.
Include a sense of urgency by tying the transformation to the limited-time offer.

final_draft.descriptive_block_content:
Painful tugging and endless tangles—does that sound familiar? PopBrush transforms your daily routine, making hair brushing effortless and enjoyable. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a smoother, stress-free morning. 

With gentle detangling and fewer breakages, this is care your family deserves. But don’t wait—our 25% off everything offer ends soon!
final_draft.product_block_content:
PopBrush Detangling Brushes: The ultimate solution for smooth, pain-free brushing. 
Travel Brushes: Compact, easy-to-use on the go. 
Haircare Accessories: Designed to protect and enhance your hair.
final_draft.full_text_formatted:
SUBJECT: Your hair deserves this. Last chance: 25% off!
PREVIEW: Transform your hair routine with 25% off everything.

=== HERO ===
Title: Last chance to save!
Subtitle: 25% off everything—effortless detangling starts here.
CTA: Shop now

=== From frustration to relief ✨ ===
A simple brush, a world of difference.

Painful tugging and endless tangles—does that sound familiar? PopBrush transforms your daily routine, making hair brushing effortless and enjoyable. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a smoother, stress-free morning. 

With gentle detangling and fewer breakages, this is care your family deserves. But don’t wait—our 25% off everything offer ends soon!

=== PRODUCT ===
PopBrush Detangling Brushes: The ultimate solution for smooth, pain-free brushing. 
Travel Brushes: Compact, easy-to-use on the go. 
Haircare Accessories: Designed to protect and enhance your hair.
CTA: Browse now
